description: This file defines an Express route for retrieving a list of boards associated with a specific project. It sets up a GET endpoint at /api/boards that requires authentication, extracts the projectId query parameter, queries the Board model to find matching boards, and returns them as a JSON response.

methods.name: GET /api/boards
methods.description: Endpoint to list boards by project ID, requires authentication, extracts projectId from query, retrieves boards from database, and responds with the list.
